attributes.description:
SSANGYONG D20T 
2012
AUTOMATIC
87000KM
ONE OWNER
FULL SERVICE HISTORY
SPARE KEYS
ELECTRIC WINDOWS 
POWER STEERING 
AIRCONDITIONING 
LEATHER SEATS 
RADIO CD AUX USB BLUETOOTH
MAGS WITH NEW TYRES
TOW BAR
BARGAIN 
ONLY CASH AND EFT
TRADE INS ACCEPTED 
STRICTLY NO FINANCE

WE HAVE 3 BRANCHES FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE PLEASE CONTACT US TO CONFIRM LOCATION OF YOUR DESIRED VEHICLE!

 

MONDAY TO FRIDAY: 8AM TO 5PM
SATURDAY:8AM TO 1PM








































THIS IS AN AUTHENTIC AD WITH A REPUTABLE DEALER. PLEASE BE AWARE OF SCAMS WITH FRAUDSTERS USING OTHER ADVERTISERS PHOTO’S. DO NOT PAY OVER ANY DEPOSIT’S UNLESS YOU HAVE CONFIRMED THE VEHICLE EXISTS DUE TO EXTENSIVE FRAUD!!

attributes.title: 2021 Renault Triber 1.0 Dynamique

attributes.description:
KIA SEDONA 2WD 2.2D AT 7SEATER SXL
Beautiful 2018 Sedona in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbags, aircon, power steering with controls on steering wheel. Radio with bluetooth and USB as well as Aux port for your phone. Two sunroofs, automatic dual sliding doors, automatic transmission and diesel fuel. Gives a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family. This spacious Sedona has height adjustable seats, foldable seats at the back and a caramel interior that goes perfectly with the white body. It has a reverse camera and sensors in the front and rear to assist with parking. Visit your Konfidence dealership in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.

All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Tygervalley Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal.
